thread.title: Erica

author: Erica
title: Erica
text: I order them every year for school for my 2 boys but find myself using them for many things besides school stuff. They bring chargers or controllers to their friends so I label them (even label the plugs separately since they tend to disappear). And I label (with the fill in ones) the remotes in the house since they tend to wander so I know which one is for what room. Very helpful
